targets.expr:
floor(
sum(delta(kudu_rows_upserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (host_ip) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_inserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (host_ip) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_updated{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (host_ip) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_deleted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (host_ip)
)

floor(
sum(delta(kudu_rows_upserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_inserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_updated{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_deleted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name)
)

floor(
sum(delta(kudu_rows_upserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_inserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_updated{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name) + 
sum(delta(kudu_rows_deleted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", job="kudu"}[30s])/30) by (table_name)
)

round(
delta(kudu_rows_upserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", partition=~"$kudu_tablet", job="kudu"}[30s]) / 30 +
delta(kudu_rows_inserted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", partition=~"$kudu_tablet", job="kudu"}[30s]) / 30 +
delta(kudu_rows_deleted{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", partition=~"$kudu_tablet", job="kudu"}[30s]) / 30 +
delta(kudu_rows_updated{table_name=~"$kudu_table", host_ip=~"$kudu_node", partition=~"$kudu_tablet", job="kudu"}[30s]) / 30
)
